# Interface TracerConfigInterface

Configuration for distributed tracing

#### Description

Controls sampling and behavior of trace collection

interface TracerConfigInterface {  
samplingRate?: number;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

samplingRate?

## Properties

### `Optional`samplingRate

samplingRate?: number

Sampling rate for trace collection (0.0 to 1.0)

#### Default


```
1.0

```


#### Description

Percentage of requests to trace (1.0 = 100% sampling)

#### Example


```
0.1 for 10% sampling, 1.0 for full tracing

```


### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
